65 class ServiceClient : public TapiClient
66 {
67 public:
68  // Constructor/Destructor
69 
76  ServiceClient(ros::NodeHandle *nh, std::string nodename = "");

81  // Public member functions
82  // Templated functions
83  template <typename T>
127  ros::ServiceClient **AddFeature(std::string featurename = "")
128  {
129  // Create empty options for this topic
130  std::string noTopic = "";
131  serviceName.push_back(noTopic);
132  ros::ServiceClientOptions opt;
133  ros::M_string empty;
134  ros::ServiceClient *client = 0;
135 
136  // Get the uuid (or a newly generated one) for this feature
137  std::string featureUUID = getNextFeatureUUID();
138 
139  // Set an unsed topic name to create the ServiceClientOptions
140  std::string temptopic = "/Tapi/" + uuid + "/" + featureUUID;
141  opt.init<T>(temptopic, false, empty);
142 
143  // Not connected yes -> it should be a NUL-pointer
144  ros::ServiceClient **clientptr = 0;
145 
146  // Save ServiceClientOptions and the empty ServiceClient in a pair
147  std::pair<ros::ServiceClientOptions, ros::ServiceClient *> newEntry;
148  newEntry = std::make_pair(opt, client);
149  clients.push_back(newEntry);
150 
151  // Generate a feature message for the featureMsgs vector of Tapi::TapiClient
152  tapi_lib::Feature feature;
153  ros::AdvertiseServiceOptions temp;
154  // We need to temporarily create AdvertiseServiceOptions so we can get a string of the topic/service type (only
155  // available in AdvertiseServiceOptions but not in ServiceClientOptions)
156  temp = ros::AdvertiseServiceOptions::create<T>("", NULL, ros::VoidPtr(), NULL);
157  std::string temp2 = temp.datatype;
158  feature.FeatureType = temp2;
159  feature.Name = featurename;
160  feature.UUID = featureUUID;
161  featureMsgs.push_back(feature);
162 
163  // Give the caller of this funtion the pointer to the element in the vector so he can dereference it and see if
164  // there currently is a connected service (then he can derefernce twice and use the service)
165  clientptr = &clients.at(clients.size() - 1).second;
166  connect();
167  return clientptr;
168  }
169 
170 private:
171  // Private member functions
172 
183  void readConfigMsg(const tapi_lib::Connection::ConstPtr &msg);
184 
185  // Private member variables
186 
196  std::vector<std::pair<ros::ServiceClientOptions, ros::ServiceClient *>> clients;
197 
203  ros::Subscriber configSub;
204 
206  ros::NodeHandle *nh;
207 
209  std::string nodename;
210 
216  std::vector<std::string> serviceName;
217 };
218 }
